complianceText:
The chatbot description provides a list of valid part-of-speech tags. Upon examining the provided output "JJJRRS", it does not match any tag in the given list. Furthermore, according to the description, if the word cannot be tagged with the listed tags, it should return "Unknown", and if unable to tag the word, it should return "CantAnswer". Since "JJJRRS" is neither a valid tag nor one of the specified alternatives for unknown or untaggable words, it violates the chatbot's description.
